{{Infobox Artist Discography |Artist = [[Ultrabeat (English band)|Ultrabeat]] |Image = |Image size = |Caption = |Studio = 2 |Studio link = Albums |Live = |Compilation = |Internet = |Video = |Music videos = 10 |Tribute = |EP = |Singles = 9 |B-sides = |Soundtrack = |Tribute = |References = Yes |Ref link = References and footnotes }} This is the discography of the [[British people|British]] [[electronic dance music|dance]] group '''[[Ultrabeat (English band)|Ultrabeat]]'''. Most of Ultrabeat's productions are released on the [[All Around the World (record label)|All Around the World]] record label. The page includes all their [[album]]s, [[Single (music)|singles]], [[music video]]s. ==Albums== {|class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! rowspan="2"|Year ! rowspan="2"|Album details ! colspan="3"|Chart peak positions ! width="120" rowspan="2"|[[Music recording sales certification|Certifications]]
